channel.title: Aws on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Aws on Blog

item.title: TTS-API connectors updated!
item.description: Image source: Interactive Powers Interactive Powers introduces 45+ Languages & 300+ additional Text-to-Speech voices with Amazon, Google and Microsoft Cloud TTS-API Integration. Natural Language over the Phone… All of you know that cognitive services are growing this days, and that’s why today we’re going to talk about a brand-new API, “Text to speech”. This API can convert text into natural voice in just a few seconds even less. There are a lot of Cloud Speech APIs for Text To Speech, but we will focus on the Cloud Giants: Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure and Amazon Web Services.

item.title: Amazon Polly TTS connector
item.description: Image source: Interactive Powers Interactive Powers introduces 27 Languages & 60+ additional Text-to-Speech voices with Amazon Polly Integration About Amazon… Amazon Polly is a Text-to-Speech (TTS) service that uses advanced deep learning technologies to synthesize speech that sounds like a human voice. It’s part of the voice of Alexa and can do much more for your business too. Amazon has arround 60 voices across 30 languages and variants.
